name: francis94c/blogger

config-items.name: (string) Internal name of blog table to load
config-items.header_footer: (boolean) Whether to display the header and footer on all app pages.
config-items.new_post_url: (string) Base URL for the app page responsible for showing the post editor
config-items.admin_session_key: (string) The session key to read logged in admin id from.
config-items.secure: (boolean) Whether to restrict access to Admin controller if no id is found in session with ' admin_session_key' (not logged in).

description: A Blog Library for Code Igniter.
